topic.title: Searching and Refactoring Actions in NVDL Schemas

section.title: Search Actions
section.p: The following search actions can be applied on name, useMode, and startMode attributes and are available from the Search submenu in the contextual menu of the current editor or from the Document References menu:
The following action is available from the contextual menu and the Document Schema XSL menu:

ul.li: Go to Definition - Moves the cursor to its definition in the schema used by the NVDL to validate it.You can also use the shortcut on a reference to display its definition.
